<!--This file is generated by `build-packages.js`-->

# rehype-minify-javascript-url

Minify JavaScript URLs.

## Install

```sh
npm install rehype-minify-javascript-url
```

## Example

##### In

```html
<img src="javascript:alert(true)">
```

##### Out

```html
<img src="javascript:alert(!0)">
```
